info.name: Discord - Hide avatars [Updated May 2024]
info.description:
Updated may 2024.

Hide avatars in channels and friends chats when using the "cozy" message style in Discord!

Like this style? Maybe you'll enjoy my other compact styles for minimizing the channels+friends sidebar and hiding the "Gift nitro", "Send stickers", "Send GIF" and "Send emojis" buttons on the right hand side of the chatting input!

Check them out on my profile. :)
info.additionalInfo:
05. may 2024
v0.2 - Updated to work again.

10. feb 2022
v0.1 - Published version that minimizes/hides the Channel and Friends sidebar. Tested on Chromium on Windows desktop.
